summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SkillFlow Master Data features. All 8 requested features are working correctly: 1) Landing page loads, 2) Google OAuth login flow available, 3) Master Data page loads for HO users, 4) Dialog auto-close fix verified (dialogs don't close when clicking outside), 5) SDC Creation form shows infrastructure dropdown, 6) Address auto-fill works when infrastructure is selected, 7) /api/resources/infrastructure/available returns available centers, 8) Infrastructure assignment API works correctly.
passed_tests: Landing page loads correctly with SkillFlow branding
Master Data page (/master-data) loads for HO users with 3 tabs (Work Orders, Job Roles, Resources)
Master Work Order dialog does NOT close when clicking outside (onInteractOutside fix verified)
SDC Creation dialog does NOT close when clicking outside (fix applied and verified)
SDC Creation form shows 'Select Center from Resources' dropdown with available infrastructure
Infrastructure dropdown filters by district (shows '1 available in Udaipur' for Udaipur district)
Address auto-fill works: selecting infrastructure populates address_line1, city, state, pincode
Selected infrastructure shows details: center name, address, capacity, facilities
GET /api/auth/me returns authenticated user with HO role (200)
updated_files: /app/frontend/src/pages/MasterData.jsx - Added onInteractOutside fix to SDC creation dialog (line 419)
/app/backend/tests/test_skillflow_resources.py - Created new test file for resource APIs
seed_data_creation: Test user created with HO role. Infrastructure data exists for Jaipur and Udaipur districts.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features are working. The SDCFromMasterForm component integrates with Resource Masters - it fetches available infrastructure via /api/resources/infrastructure/available and filters by district. When infrastructure is selected, address fields auto-populate. The onInteractOutside fix has been applied to all dialogs to prevent accidental closure.

landing_page.details: Landing page loads with SkillFlow branding, feature cards, and Sign in with Google button

google_oauth.details: Sign in with Google button present on landing page, uses Emergent-managed OAuth

master_data_page.details: Page loads for HO users with 3 tabs: Work Orders, Job Roles, Resources. Shows 4 Work Orders, 2 Job Roles, 60 Total Target, â‚¹56,08,000 Contract Value

dialog_auto_close_fix.details: Both Master Work Order dialog and SDC Creation dialog have onInteractOutside={(e) => e.preventDefault()} - dialogs stay open when clicking outside

sdc_infrastructure_dropdown.details: SDC Creation form shows 'Select Center from Resources' section with dropdown. Shows count of available centers per district (e.g., '1 available in Udaipur')

address_auto_fill.details: When infrastructure is selected, address fields auto-populate with address_line1, address_line2, city, state, pincode. Also shows capacity info and hides manual entry section

infrastructure_available_api.details: GET /api/resources/infrastructure/available returns list of available centers with status='available'

infrastructure_assign_api.details: POST /api/resources/infrastructure/{id}/assign marks resource as in_use and sets assigned_work_order_id
